data.title: Commissioned Gunner RN: A Biography of Alfred William Davis (1895
data.meta_description: Commissioned Gunner RN: A Biography of Alfred William Davis (1895 - 1941) by Davis, Neville A. - ISBN 10: 1904470068 - ISBN 13: 9781904470069 - Bernard Durnford Publishing - 2006 - Hardcover
data.text:
Commissioned Gunner RN [the Life of Alfred William Davis 1895-1941]

Neville Alfred Davis

Hardcover. Condition: New. Dust Jacket Condition: New. Original cloth and dustwrapper in new condition, 752pp, with fine illustrations. A real tour-de-force by the author who set out to reconstruct the life and long naval career of his father who was killed in action in 1941 on HMS Southampton. His father had joined the Navy in 1895 and the author has, after many years research, examined in detail all the ships that his father served in and the actions in which they were engaged, and in doing so has produced a remarkably detailed history of the life in the Royal Navy at the time. There will be additional postage due to weight [2.5kg]. Seller Inventory # X003354
